website_summaries.verdict: A high-quality golf shoe noted for its outstanding support and stylish look.
pros: A stylish design that is easy to clean
cons: Like many other Ecco models, this shoe tends to run a little large
Not as soft as other shoes

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Too Long, But Still Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Even though the length is about 1/2 inch longer than his other Ecco golf shoes that are supposed to be the same size, my husband still loves them. This makes him 5 or 6 pairs of Ecco golf shoes and he says they are the best golf shoes he has ever worn. He has a very high arch and they give good support. He also has 2 pair of Ecco athletic shoes and he loves them, too. He highly recommends Ecco shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: The EVO One ECCO White/Dark Shadow golf shoes are excellent shoes. They are well made, very comfortable and provide good traction. They even come with both red and white laces to suit your style. Their size is listed as the European 42, 8/8.5, so they are a little bigger than a normal size 8 but not by very much so they fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: MikeJA

customer_reviews.title: Totally disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing Ecco's for the past 10 years, and have never worried about quality. However, in this instance, the front of the shoes started peeling! Like paint! Can't believe this. I only had them for two weeks, so I sent them back for a refund and bought another brand. C'mon Ecco!
customer_reviews.author: Willie TEXAS

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend them to anyone who values a little extra in ...
customer_reviews.text: Ecco's are the Cadillac of golf shoes in my estimation. Perhaps it's the European sizing, but I've always gotten fit extremely well by ordering the size 45 as I normally wear an 11 in US size. Ecco's may be a little more expensive at the outset but they are well worth the money in comfort and support. I would recommend them to anyone who values a little extra in a golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Glen Ludwick

customer_reviews.title: Beware of poor color fading
customer_reviews.text: Update on these shoes, the color started fading badly, especially in the toe area just 2 months after purchase. They were grey, but not kind of grey to whitish. Pretty ugly. They're still comfortable and well built, but they're very ugly. I'm going to try and dye them. Too ugly to wear.
customer_reviews.author: dpantle

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too big
customer_reviews.text: First the quality was okay... They seemed a little stiff and narrow but the length was way too large. I had to return them for the length. For comparison size wise, I purchased Nike TW 2015 size 10 and they fit perfectly. If you buy the excise they are nice but you may want to order a wider width and go down a full size due to the length.
customer_reviews.author: Laf6502

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever owned. This is my second pair of Ecco shoes and I have never been able to find anything better.
customer_reviews.author: James Garner

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money....
customer_reviews.text: Third pair of Ecco golf shoes I've owned. All three fit me very well (although their sizes run large) The EVO's also fit perfectly, are very comfortable, and look very nice. I find no reason to ever buy hard spiked golf shoes again. ECCO clearly makes a very high-quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th pair of Ecco shoes and I would have more but they seem to last longer than others. This pair is very comfortable and I walked 18 holes the first time out. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Style & Comfort
customer_reviews.text: wasn't completed sure about the color coordination but love them now that I have them and again comfort is impeccable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Too narrow. Have bought many Ecco shoes over the years which fit perfectly , but this pair are just too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look no further for the best golf shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoe, on and off the greens. These shoes are great. They support and invigorate a golfer's feet--which means a golfer who has a "lively" step will play better and last longer even on the nineteenth hole.
customer_reviews.author: musicstarrman

customer_reviews.title: ... an ECCO fan for years and these do not disappoint. These are my first pair of ECCO golf ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been an ECCO fan for years and these do not disappoint. These are my first pair of ECCO golf shoes. The shoes are comfortable and the color scheme is stylish and still looks clean after walking the course.
customer_reviews.author: T.Tech

customer_reviews.title: I should have ordered 6 6. 5, my ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have ordered 6 6.5, my previous ECCO was a 40. I should have looked at the bottom of shoe. However, I just ordered an ECCO from Golfers Wearhouse, size 40.
customer_reviews.author: norton halber

customer_reviews.title: It is the most comfortable pair I have ever owned
customer_reviews.text: After going through several pairs of Golf Shoes (light use) I bought this pair. It is the most comfortable pair I have ever owned, you can pretty much wear them all day like tennis shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair - Still the best golf shoe I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: After walking 18 holes I needed the shoe stretcher on one of them overnight. This is my second pair and still the best golf shoes I have ever had.
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I recommend trying a pair on at a local store before buying online. I usually wear a 12 - 13 shoe but went with the 45 in Ecco because I had tried some on in a store and knew that's what I needed. 45 is 11 - 11.5 in US measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Bro-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: This shoe runs large
customer_reviews.text: I've been ordering these ECCO brand golf shoes for a few years and the size 44 has fit me perfectly. This style, however was one size too large. I replaced them with the size 43 and they fit just right. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Had to go down a size.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear size nine so I bought the size 43 (9-9.5) and they were definitely too big so I bought the size 42 and they fit great. A little harder feel than expected but not bad. Definitely look good.
customer_reviews.author: cjaye

customer_reviews.title: great shoe. walked 18 first day I got them ...
customer_reviews.text: great shoe. walked 18 first day I got them and not a problem. I usually wear an 11 but heard these fit a little large. the 10-10.5 size was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ian Riggall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, have played 8 rounds so far with these ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, have played 8 rounds so far with these shoes and couldn't be happier with them... very comfortable as always with Ecco.
customer_reviews.author: morsel

customer_reviews.title: A good product
customer_reviews.text: thought i would try a spikeless shoe this year and went with Ecco since my other pair is the same brand. Have now played 6 rounds and I am very pleased. My feet do not hurt at the end of a 5 hour round walking. Would buy again as of now.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: They be 5-star after I get them broken in
customer_reviews.text: They are really comfortable but after a couple of hours walking the course my feet were a little tired. Nothing that can't be fixed with a little more wear and adjustment of the laces.
customer_reviews.author: R3naud

customer_reviews.title: There is a design issue with the right shoe and ...
customer_reviews.text: There is a design issue with the right shoe and Amazon, the seller and Ecco will not stand behind it
customer_reviews.author: ALLAN BROSS

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes with minor personal, fixable . problem
customer_reviews.text: Right shoe fits perfectly. Left shoe creates some discomfort on mid left side of foot a short time after initial wear but not enough to keep me from playing 18 holes of golf. May need a better insert. No problem when I use an insert from one of my ecco dress shoes.
customer_reviews.author: orthoear

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but initial wear could be softer.
customer_reviews.text: I like ecco shoes. But the initial wear is tough. It's hard and not soft on the feet when walking and the shoes bend.
customer_reviews.author: Hai Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe!....well constructed, durable & soooooo comfortable! Pricey, but worth it to you who have problems getting a correct fit. I have a back problem & need a lift in my right shoe. I ordered the men's ECCO to accommodate the lift. The shoe runs narrow in both ladies' & men's shoe, but is a rare find in golf shoes (even for ladies). I would definitely recommend this shoe to all serious golfers!
customer_reviews.author: katie v. Cage

customer_reviews.title: they seem to have stretched out fine.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair. The tops of my feet were rubbing, unlike my previous pair. But after three rounds, they seem to have stretched out fine.
customer_reviews.author: Joel J.

customer_reviews.title: Cool shoe !!
customer_reviews.text: Like the look, fit, performance and excellent price for a high quality shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Wayneandy

customer_reviews.title: One size smaller than usual.
customer_reviews.text: Before ordering these shoes from Amazon I went to a local golf store to try on a size 46 which is what I normally wear, they felt a little too roomy. So I ordered a size 45 and they are okay. I have worn then twice while walking 18 and they are as comfortable as any of my other size 46 golf shoes. When you can find Ecco golf shoes on sale, grab them, I do.
customer_reviews.author: gklink

customer_reviews.title: They Work
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat large(long). I wear 10 and 10-101/2 was a little too long. 91/2-10 probably would have been OK. Not the greatest arch support but sufficient. Nice leather upper and well constructed but could fit better. They will work for me but I will be able to tell better after wearing on the links for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Blow

customer_reviews.title: ECCO IS THE BEST GOLF SHOE MADE
customer_reviews.text: ECCO IS THE BEST GOLF SHOE MADE. ALWAYS A PERFECT FIT WITH MY EUROPEAN SIZE, UNLIKE OTHERS THAT HAVE TO BE TRIED ON. ONCE YOU KNOW YOUR EUROPEAN SIZE, AND ORDER, THEY ARE A PERFECT FIT FOR A PERFECT PRICE.
customer_reviews.author: CHESTER A. MILLER, JR

customer_reviews.title: The best ECCO golf shoe so far.
customer_reviews.text: I've converted to all ECCO for golf and of the four pairs I now own, this is the most comfortable. It seems to have more arch support than the others. Sturdy and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Tennis shoes that can almost pass as dressy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes looks even better in person! Tennis shoes that can almost pass as dressy shoes ... Super cool.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Oddball sizing system.
customer_reviews.text: Instead of normal sizes, Ecco comes in combo sizes i.e 11-11 .1/2. This poses a problem for me as I can't seem to find a combo that fits.
customer_reviews.author: roger gibson

customer_reviews.title: ECCO = Comfort
customer_reviews.text: Ecco shoes run slightly larger than most brands. I wear a size 10 in most sneakers, but I wear a 43 (9 - 9.5) in Ecco. As long as you know that going in you're good to go. This is my third pair of Ecco golf shoes. They are the most comfortable golf shoes I've ever worn. Great arch support which is a must for me. These are great golf shoes, and if you're patient you can get them for a great price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron W.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. This my fourth pair. They are the most comfortable golf shoes I have ever worn. They also look good enough to wear to dinner after golf.
customer_reviews.author: WDW

customer_reviews.title: I Luv Ecco shoes I have 6 pair of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I Luv Ecco shoes I have 6 pair of the ECCO street/golf shoes I wear an 8.5 size in American............but in ECCO 42 9 8 -8.5)that is too small But the 43 is a little too big.........that is the problem with European sizes
customer_reviews.author: Bfunke

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO WEAR THEM PLAYING GOLF ...
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE NOT BEEN ABLE TO WEAR THEM PLAYING GOLF YET. THEY ARE RATHER EXPENSIVE. YOU OFFERED A $30.00 DISCOUNT IF TOOK YOUR CREDIT CARD. I HAVE TOO MANY CREDIT CARDS NOW.
customer_reviews.author: Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Shoes too small to be comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I own several pair of ECCO golf shoes and love them. These particular shoes do not live up to the same standards. They are simply too small to be comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy 24

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! My second pair. By a pair, you will love them!
customer_reviews.author: Regular guy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe - great price
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Ecco shoes. Very comfortable and high quality. Very consistent fit - no worries ordering on line.
customer_reviews.author: Charles W Wright

customer_reviews.title: Too large. Lack of half sizes may be a ...
customer_reviews.text: Too large. Lack of half sizes may be a problem. I'll try the next size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazro

customer_reviews.title: ECCO Golf shoes
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes and what I expected from top quality merchandise.
customer_reviews.author: Richard H. Mindak

customer_reviews.title: I have always purchased size 12. These shoes are ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always purchased size 12. These shoes are designed to fit 12 - 12 1/2. They are just a bit snug. I am going to keep them and will provide additional feedback after a couple of weeks.They do look well made.
customer_reviews.author: Robin T.

customer_reviews.title: used to put on Ecco shoes which is very comfortable and available for golf game
customer_reviews.text: when i played golf, used to put on Ecco shoes which is very comfortable and available for golf game.
customer_reviews.author: Min L.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for all golfers
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoes. Excellent fit and very comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Papa From WG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These have excellent quality, fit and comfort. I have worn them for 2 rounds in total comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Middleton

customer_reviews.title: ... wear this shoes when I play golf now So comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: I always wear this shoes when I play golf now So comfortable! !
customer_reviews.author: sang shin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but runs large
customer_reviews.text: Great, comfortable lightweight shoe that I highly recommend. However, they definitely run large. I have always been a very true 9.5 so ordered the 43 (9-9.5) but had to return for the 42 (8-8.5) which fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: PVCO24

customer_reviews.title: High quality, reasonably prices
customer_reviews.text: Everything is good, no problems. Have not used in inclement as yet.
customer_reviews.author: Ross E. Irlam

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 43 the first time, same as my other Ecco golf shoes, but they were to big, gave them to my son and bought 42s and they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: From the first round, the shoe fits and feels great. I walk 18 twice a week. No break in with this shoe. Neither feet nor legs were tired after 18 holes. A great find.
customer_reviews.author: hgg

customer_reviews.title: Missing laces
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly. The extra laces I have come to expect with Ecco were not included?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smart-looking shoes that are easy to wear and very comfortable. I am very pleased with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are somewhat large and foot bed is to hard ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are somewhat large and foot bed is to hard for my feet still waiting for an RA# to return to rockbottomgolf
customer_reviews.author: George Kientzy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little larger than expected but very comfortable and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Minh B Luu

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good product.Very comfortable.I use it for golfing.No discomfort at all. Strongly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: R R T

customer_reviews.title: Ecco is the way to go
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! A little bigger than I thought, but still a good looking golf shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Ethan P

customer_reviews.title: POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: horrible quality. paint started peeling/falling off after just a few rounds of golf. I would not buy these shoes. what has happened to ecco? prices going up and quality going way down.
customer_reviews.author: BW-KD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excelent product! Ecco is the best brand in a Golf shoes!and amazon is the best way to get diferents items! congratulations
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto Inda

customer_reviews.title: Golf Shoes
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy with the fit and look of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: grandma/teacher

customer_reviews.title: ECCO shoe - great for walking the course
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly and very comfortable both on the course and afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight L Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! Pay attention to size
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Pay attention to size. I bought one size smaller based on a review suggestion. It was right on.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Cannon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Euro size 44 will be a little tight for a 10.5 foot, I think they will be ok..
customer_reviews.author: Robert  Black

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are the best golf shoes! I've played 5 rounds in them and their great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Typical great Ecco
customer_reviews.text: Just a typical Ecco shoe, well constructed and comfortable. European sizing is very helpful. Also a great looking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Dpado

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't a great fit for me personally. Debating on returning them...
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe though not the best fit for a wide.foot.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Wicks

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the looks but it just didn't fit right
customer_reviews.author: rich

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: the shoe is somewhat small and also the collors are not the same as it was depicted
customer_reviews.author: Bijan Afra

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best golf shoes you can buy, no break in put them on and go..
customer_reviews.author: John Archambault

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: COULD BE THE MOST COMFORTABLE GOLF SHOES I'VE EVER PURCHASED.
customer_reviews.author: pj blatner

customer_reviews.title: I wore these shoes for 1 round of golf, ...
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for 1 round of golf, right big toe and right knee were in pain, haven't worn since
customer_reviews.author: john w shumaker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I usly wear a 10 and they were way big.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Daggett

customer_reviews.title: ... two pair of Ecco street shoes that are very comfortable. I was really disappointed in these golf shoes ...
customer_reviews.text: I have two pair of Ecco street shoes that are very comfortable. I was really disappointed in these golf shoes and returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jaymor Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Very comfortable. Now if only my golf game was anywhere as good....
customer_reviews.author: Roger Wise

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the shoes seems to be very good. Unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because of the ECCO shoe reputation and the reviews of friends who have them. The quality of the shoes seems to be very good. Unfortunately, they were too long ( I wear size 9 and ordered the 8/8.5 size 42 based on my friiends saying they ran large) and very narrow. I think I could order the size 41 and the length would be OK, but thats not going to help the narrowness. If you have the right shape of foot then I think these would be quality golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mckay

customer_reviews.title: great shoe
customer_reviews.text: nice shoe great fit I would order another pair as soon as I can test these shoes on the course
customer_reviews.author: dennis

customer_reviews.title: Product looked used
customer_reviews.text: I returned them as the laces were worn and the edge of the shoes were scuffed. I did not expect a used pair of shoes
customer_reviews.author: Paul Rauthmell

customer_reviews.title: strings too long
customer_reviews.text: shoes is good but its strings are too long as 49"..I need to buy shorter things like 44"
customer_reviews.author: jung

product_meta.title: ECCO Men's Street EVO One Golf Shoe
product_meta.description: ECCO is a European shoe company founded in Denmark in 1963. Today they own and operate factories throughout Europe and Asia. They produce all the leather used in making Ecco shoes, taking measures to protect the environment at the same time. Their sole aim is to make a comfortable walking shoe.
